scripts.build-win: if exist dist rmdir /s dist && set NODE_ENV=production && .\node_modules\.bin\babel src\lib --out-dir dist --copy-files --ignore __tests__,spec.js,test.js,__snapshots__
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src/lib --out-dir dist --copy-files --ignore __tests__,spec.js,test.js,__snapshots__
scripts.package-win: npm run build-win && npm pack && ren *.tgz %npm_package_name%.tgz
scripts.package: npm run build && npm pack && ren *.tgz %npm_package_name%.tgz
